title: [管理]iControlU —— 可以控制玩家的插件[1.5.1~1.6.4]
author: lihangyu919
txt_content:
本帖最后由 lihangyu919 于 2013-10-5 22:09 编辑 

前言：
记得上次我发了个插件：旁观者插件：http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=172850&highlight=%B9%DB%B2%EC 可是只能看人不能控制人 怎么办？ 放心 这插件来帮助你！！

iControlU is a Bukkit server plugin which enables server admins to control other players! Yes, mind control has entered Minecraft! With iCU, you can easily control a target's movements, chats, inventory, and more. Everyone loves to troll, and now you can troll at the next level!   Using iCU is easy: first pick a target - the player who unfortunately gets to be picked on. Second: use the command /icu control (that player's name). Finally, begin moving. You literally control your target like a puppet! Feel free to impersonate him in chat, grief his friend's house, mess with his inventory, and ultimately troll him! When you're finished, you can simply exit Control Mode. To do that, use the command /icu stop. You are given invisibility for 10 seconds, so you can run from the scene and never be caught! Or, you can always repeat the process again if you're up to it!   iControlU thinks of the troller first. As you are controlling a player, we made sure you can't get caught. You are completely hidden from other players as well as the target himself while you are in Control Mode. And, like stated above, you keep that invisibility for a few seconds after controlling so you can teleport away and never be suspected! Therefore, install iControlU and begin trolling at the next level!   Commands   /icu control (player) - enter Control Mode. (player) is now your puppet!  /icu stop - exit Control Mode and return your target to free will.  /icu inv (player) - open the inventory belonging to (player)   Permissions   icu.use -- main permission. This is required to make all other permissions work  icu.control -- allows use of /icu control (player)  icu.stop -- allows use of /icu stop  icu.exempt -- players with this node cannot be controlled  icu.inv -- players with this node can see other player's inventories 



他确实能控制人 实在是一个好插件 为何不下载呢？ 

操作： /icu control XXX 控制  /icu stop 停止控制 是不是很简单呢？
